committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts and Humanities

official_title: A bill to promote excellence in education, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Quality in Education Act of 1987 - Establishes the Optional Test of Academic Excellence. Directs the Secretary of Education to prepare or approve a comprehensive test of academic excellence designed to identify students with outstanding aptitude and ability who are in the 12th grade of secondary school. Provides that such test may be taken on a voluntary basis. Provides for certificates to be given to those who pass such test.

titles.title: A bill to promote excellence in education, and for other purposes.
